title: Personalized Learning Systems
description: Personalized learning systems adapt educational content and experiences to individual learner characteristics, using Active Inference to model student knowledge and optimize learning trajectories.
learning_objectives: Understand student modeling using Active Inference

content.overview: Personalized learning systems use Active Inference to model individual learner characteristics and adapt educational experiences accordingly. By treating learning as inference about knowledge states, these systems can optimize content selection, pacing, and instructional strategies for each student.

common_misconceptions.misconception: Personalized learning requires perfect knowledge of students
common_misconceptions.clarification: Systems work with uncertainty and update beliefs continuously
Depends on model accuracy and content quality
Technology supports and enhances human instruction
